title: Tesla Model X set for official launch on 29 September | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Tesla modelX]() Credit: @lgbtfeedla ### Twitter gives users more power to report fakers, as purge continues](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/twitter-is-giving-users-more-power-to-report-fake-accounts-as-purge-continues-3613624 "Twitter gives users morepower to report fakers, as purge continues")  * The firm is yet to announce complete details (leaving at least some intriguefor the event), but is likely to have a lower range than the Model S estimatesof between 230 and 265 miles.**SEE ALSO:[Tesla announces the best friend referral dealever](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/tesla-announces-the-best-friend-referral-offer-ever)**Tesla boss Elon Musk is also likely to confirm the pricing and options for thevehicle.Don’t expect Musk to cut would-be electric car buyers any slack on the price,though: the Model X is expected to cost as much as the $70,000 Model S.However, an entry-level model (albeit a $35,000) is expected to [arrive in2017 under the Model 3 name](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/tesla-to-show-off-its-affordable-model-3-electric-car-next-march).The launch event will come on a now-busy day in the tech calendar, with Googlealso revealing it’ll be holding a gathering on September 29.There it is expected to [announce new Nexusdevices](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/report-google-s-new-smartphones-called-nexus-5x-and-nexus-6p) and the completed version of Android Marshmallow
